sentences.en: Beet tops are somewhat like spinach.
Corinna: Spinach! That's a vegetable. I don't believe it.
sentences.cn: 科琳娜: 菠菜! 那是一种蔬菜, 我不信.

sentences.en: Eating spinach is supposed to make you strong.
sentences.cn: 据说吃菠菜能使人强壮.

sentences.en: Either you eat your spinach or you go without ice - cream.
sentences.cn: 你要么把菠菜吃了,要么你不吃冰淇淋.

sentences.en: He asks the girl, "Do you like spinach?"She says"No", and the silence returns.
sentences.cn: 他问女孩儿： “你喜欢吃菠菜吗?”女到七说不喜欢。两人又归于沉默。

sentences.en: I don't like spinach even though I know it's good for me.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢菠菜,即使我知道它对我很有好处.

sentences.en: I'll have the green peas instead of the spinach.
sentences.cn: 我想要份青豆而不是菠菜.

sentences.en: Popeye the sailorman eats spinach to make him strong.
sentences.cn: 大力水手吃菠菜使自己很强壮.

sentences.en: She likes to have field mint ice - cream and spinach.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢吃薄荷冰淇淋和菠菜.

sentences.en: Some of the best brain foods: walnuts, blueberries and spinach.
sentences.cn: 一些最好的“大脑食物”：胡桃、蓝莓和菠菜。

sentences.en: Spinach with bean curd is one of my favourite dishes.
sentences.cn: 菠菜豆腐是我最爱吃的一种菜.

sentences.en: Spinach, egg - plant, cabbage, cauliflower, cucumber and turnip are our favorite vegetables.
sentences.cn: 菠菜, 茄子, 卷心菜, 花椰菜, 黄瓜,和萝卜都是我们喜欢吃的蔬菜.

sentences.en: The transacetylase system was also present in spinach leaves.
sentences.cn: 在菠菜叶片中也存在着转乙酰酶系统.

sentences.en: There's chocolate and peppermint and also spinach, liver and tripe.
sentences.cn: 有巧克力和薄荷口味,也有菠菜 、 肝脏口味,还有牛肚口味.

sentences.en: Would you like cabbage or spinach?
You should eat such vegetables as carrot, celery and spinach.
sentences.cn: 你应该吃胡萝卜 、 芹菜和菠菜这类的蔬菜.

trans.tran_en: a vegetable with large dark green leaves
